Class DrawingArea

      • java.awt.Container

              • view.DrawingArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, DrawingAreaInt

    public class DrawingArea
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements DrawingAreaInt
    Author:
    baptiste Controller de DrawingArea, il contient la liste des formes et se charge de les afficher.
    See Also:
